title: Q&A June 2020: New Dark Age, Civil Tensions, How to Live in an Age of Propaganda, Building Faith
description:
Here is the June 2020 Q & A for the Annus Horribilis 2020. Many interesting questions ranging from art to music to faith. But the real issue here is obviously the turmoil of the last few months. There was a sense of anxiety in the questions that wasn't present last time I did it earlier this year. I tried to do justice to the questions. I'm sure I left a lot unsaid. But then again I spent an hour and a half talking. So SOMETHING must have been said. Give a listen. Give me your feedback. 

HEY! SUPPORT THIS CHANNEL TODAY. Please consider a monthly contribution through PayPal to receive extra content and to help me afloat here in Georgia. And if you start today you can get 10 hours worth of extra content immediately. 
Click this... https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G9LDYMSPZ5RGG
Watch this video for more about our extra content:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nykTp3TziRY

My other YouTube channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 

The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas: https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ 

The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts. 
https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 

And to understand more about my life in Georgia check out my Georgian Crossroads channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeFJ6Tm71ieNcjcUb-Trc8g

And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 

Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. 
From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Swimming Against the Stream
Byrne
#newdarkage #juvenilization #faith
